params.amount: amount to transfer from origin to target

returns._0: total, The most recent total staked amount on contract
reward, Total network reward for the given era
staked, Total staked amount for the given era

params.staker: in form of 20 or 32 hex bytes

returns._0: amount, Staked amount by the staker

params.staker: in form of 20 or 32 hex bytes

returns._0: amount, Staked amount by the staker
period, The unbonding period in eras

params.reward_destination: instruction on how the reward payout should be handled

bond_and_stake(address,uint128).notice: Stake provided amount on the contract.

claim_dapp(address,uint128).notice: Claim one era of unclaimed dapp rewards for the specified contract and era.

claim_staker(address).notice: Claim one era of unclaimed staker rewards for the specifeid contract.         Staker account is derived from the caller address.

nomination_transfer(address,uint128,addr.notice: Transfer part or entire nomination from origin smart contract to target smart contract

read_contract_stake(address).notice: Read the staked amount from the era when the amount was last staked/unstaked

read_era_reward(uint32).notice: Read Total network reward for the given era

read_era_staked(uint32).notice: Read Total staked amount for the given era

read_staked_amount(bytes).notice: Read Staked amount for the staker

read_staked_amount_on_contract(address,b.notice: Read Staked amount on a given contract for the staker

set_reward_destination(uint8).notice: Set reward destination for staker rewards

unbond_and_unstake(address,uint128).notice: Start unbonding process and unstake balance from the contract.

withdraw_from_unregistered(address).notice: Withdraw staked funds from an unregistered contract.

withdraw_unbonded().notice: Withdraw all funds that have completed the unbonding process.

documentation.text:
@notice Read current era.
 @return era, The current era

@notice Read unbonding period constant.
 @return period, The unbonding period in eras

@notice Read Total network reward for the given era
 @return reward, Total network reward for the given era

@notice Read Total staked amount for the given era
 @return staked, Total staked amount for the given era

@notice Read the staked amount from the era when the amount was last staked/unstaked
 @return total, The most recent total staked amount on contract
@notice Stake provided amount on the contract.
@notice Start unbonding process and unstake balance from the contract.
@notice Withdraw all funds that have completed the unbonding process.

@notice Claim one era of unclaimed staker rewards for the specifeid contract.
         Staker account is derived from the caller address.
@notice Claim one era of unclaimed dapp rewards for the specified contract and era.

@notice Set reward destination for staker rewards
 @param reward_destination instruction on how the reward payout should be handled

@notice Withdraw staked funds from an unregistered contract.
 @param smart_contract smart contract address

Interface to the precompiled contract on Shibuya/Shiden/Astar
 Predeployed at the address 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000005001
